# Change default_user_agent() in utils.py to Firefox.
# See: http://erogamescape.dyndns.org/usage/usage_201411.html
# Use the same user agent as one of the most used one in erogamescape

    return "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/38.0.2125.111 Safari/537.36"
